name: C++
description: Learn C++ programming with modern OOP, templates, STL, and C++11/14/17/20 features.

tutorials.title: 1. Setting Up C++: Compiler and IDE
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guide to installing a C++ compiler (GCC/Clang/MSVC) and setting up your IDE (VS Code, CLion, or Code::Blocks).

tutorials.title: 2. Writing and Running Your First C++ Program
tutorials.description: Learn how to write your first C++ program: Hello World. Understand the structure of a C++ file, including headers, main function, and compilation steps.

tutorials.title: 3. Understanding C++ Program Structure
tutorials.description: Breakdown of the key parts of a C++ program: preprocessor directives, main function, statements, and return values.

tutorials.title: 4. Input and Output with iostream
tutorials.description: Learn how to use cin and cout for basic input and output in C++. Includes formatting and simple examples.

tutorials.title: 5. C++ Syntax and Structure
tutorials.description: Learn the basic syntax of C++ including headers, main function, statements, and semicolons. Understand how braces define code blocks.

tutorials.title: 6. Comments in C++
tutorials.description: Learn how to use single-line (//) and multi-line (/* */) comments to document your C++ code effectively.

tutorials.title: 7. Data Input and Output
tutorials.description: Understand how to use cout for output and cin for input in C++. Learn formatting tricks and escape sequences.

tutorials.title: 8. Type Casting in C++
tutorials.description: Learn how to convert between data types using implicit casting and explicit casting (static_cast, dynamic_cast, etc.).

tutorials.title: 9. Constants and Literals
tutorials.description: Learn how to define constants using const and #define, and understand literals like integers, floating-point, and character constants.

tutorials.title: 10. Variables and Data Types in C++
tutorials.description: Learn about variables, constants, and built-in data types (int, float, double, char, bool, string). Explore memory allocation and best practices for declaring variables in C++.

tutorials.title: 11. Operators and Expressions
tutorials.description: Understand arithmetic, relational, logical, assignment, and bitwise operators in C++. Learn how to build expressions and evaluate them.

tutorials.title: 12. Control Structures: Conditionals
tutorials.description: Learn how to control the flow of your program using if, else-if, else statements, and switch-case. Includes examples and best practices.

tutorials.title: 13. Loops in C++
tutorials.description: Master looping in C++ with for, while, and do-while loops. Includes nested loops and examples of common looping patterns.

tutorials.title: 14. Functions in C++
tutorials.description: Introduction to functions in C++. Learn about function declaration, definition, parameters, return values, and scope.

tutorials.title: 15. Object-Oriented Programming in C++
tutorials.description: Deep dive into OOP: classes, objects, constructors, destructors, encapsulation, and abstraction in C++.

tutorials.title: 16. Inheritance and Polymorphism
tutorials.description: Learn about single and multiple inheritance, virtual functions, method overriding, and polymorphism in C++.

tutorials.title: 17. Operator Overloading
tutorials.description: Understand how to overload arithmetic, relational, and stream operators to make classes behave like built-in types.

tutorials.title: 18. Templates in C++
tutorials.description: Learn how to write generic code with function templates, class templates, and specialization.

tutorials.title: 19. Standard Template Library (STL)
tutorials.description: Explore STL containers (vector, list, map, set), iterators, and algorithms to write efficient C++ programs.

tutorials.title: 20. Project: C++ Calculator
tutorials.description: Build a command-line calculator that supports basic operations (+, -, *, /) and input validation.

tutorials.title: 21. Project: Student Management System
tutorials.description: Create a system to manage student records with classes, file I/O, and basic search functionality.

tutorials.title: 22. Project: File Encryption Tool
tutorials.description: Build a simple text file encryption and decryption tool using C++ strings and file streams.

tutorials.title: 23. Bonus: C++ Game (Number Guessing)
tutorials.description: Write a fun number guessing game using random number generation, loops, and conditional logic.

tutorials.title: 24. Bonus: Banking System Simulation
tutorials.description: Simulate a banking system with accounts, deposits, withdrawals, and balance checks using OOP concepts.
